remarks: The inner product (Hermitian form) ` ( X , Y ) ` will be defined as ` ( ( S `` Y ) `` X ) ` .  Show closure.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hdmapipcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
hdmapipcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapipcl.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
hdmapipcl.r $e |- R = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
hdmapipcl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
hdmapipcl.s $e |- S = ( ( HDMap ` K ) ` W ) $.
hdmapipcl.k $e |- ( ph -> ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) ) $.
hdmapipcl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
hdmapipcl.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
hdmapipcl $p |- ( ph -> ( ( S ` Y ) ` X ) e. B ) $.
